di.unipi.ase.doodleservice

Class DoodleController

  • Object
    • di.unipi.ase.doodleservice.DoodleController

  • @RestController
public class DoodleController
extends Object
    Controller class that defines the behaviour of the RESTful Web API for the Doodle service. The annotations for the methods indicate the URI and the REST method to which the functionality is mapped.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoodleController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String addVote(int id, Vote v)
      Create a new vote in the doodle identified by the specific ID (it has effect only if the voter didn't vote yet for this doodle).
      int createDoodle(Doodle d)
      Create a new doodle and insert it in the list of the currently opened doodles.
      void deleteDoodle(int id)
      Remove the doodle identified by the specific ID.
      void deleteVote(int id, String name)
      Delete the vote of the given user in the doodle identified by the specific ID.
      Doodle getDoodle(int id)
      Get the doodle identified by the specific ID.
      HashMap<Integer,Doodle> getDoodles()
      Get the currently opened doodles.
      String getVote(int id, String name)
      Get the option voted by the given user in the doodle identified by the specific ID.
      String updateVote(int id, String name, Vote v)
      Post an update to the previous vote of the given user in the doodle identified by the specific ID (it has effect only if the voter already voted in the doodle).

    • Method Detail

      • createDoodle

        @RequestMapping(value="/doodles",
                method=PUT)
public int createDoodle(@RequestBody
                                                                                      Doodle d)
        Create a new doodle and insert it in the list of the currently opened doodles.
        Parameters:
        d - the JSON representation of the doodle contained in the HTTP request body
        Returns:
        the JSON representation of the poll ID

      • getDoodles

        @RequestMapping(value="/doodles",
                method=GET)
public HashMap<Integer,Doodle> getDoodles()
        Get the currently opened doodles.
        Returns:
        the doodles

      • getDoodle

        @RequestMapping(value="/doodles/{id}",
                method=GET)
public Doodle getDoodle(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                           int id)
        Get the doodle identified by the specific ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the doodle
        Returns:
        the doodle

      • deleteDoodle

        @RequestMapping(value="doodles/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public void deleteDoodle(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                              int id)
        Remove the doodle identified by the specific ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the doodle

      • addVote

        @RequestMapping(value="/doodles/{id}/vote",
                method=PUT)
public String addVote(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                              int id,
                                                                                              @RequestBody
                                                                                              Vote v)
        Create a new vote in the doodle identified by the specific ID (it has effect only if the voter didn't vote yet for this doodle).
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the doodle
        v - the JSON representation of the vote contained in the HTTP request body
        Returns:
        the name of the voter if the vote is valid, null otherwise

      • getVote

        @RequestMapping(value="/doodles/{id}/vote/{name}",
                method=GET)
public String getVote(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                     int id,
                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                     String name)
        Get the option voted by the given user in the doodle identified by the specific ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the doodle
        name - the voter
        Returns:
        the option voted by the voter in the doodle, null if the voter has never voted

      • updateVote

        @RequestMapping(value="/doodles/{id}/vote/{name}",
                method=POST)
public String updateVote(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                         int id,
                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                         String name,
                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                         Vote v)
        Post an update to the previous vote of the given user in the doodle identified by the specific ID (it has effect only if the voter already voted in the doodle).
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the doodle
        name - the voter
        v - the JSON representation of the vote contained in the HTTP request body
        Returns:
        the name of the voter if the vote is valid, null otherwise

      • deleteVote

        @RequestMapping(value="/doodles/{id}/vote/{name}",
                method=DELETE)
public void deleteVote(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                         int id,
                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                         String name)
        Delete the vote of the given user in the doodle identified by the specific ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the doodle
        name - the voter
